InstructionData.Title: Duke Tablet Mode Switch
InstructionData.Description: Switches the mode of an advanced tabletâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias TickCount r15 define FastTick 10 Start: move TickCount 999
OnState: yield l r0 db On bnez r0 OnState #transition to off move TickCount 0
OffState: yield add TickCount TickCount 1 l r0 db On beqz r0 OffState #transition to on bge TickCount FastTick Start
l r0 db Mode seqz r0 r0 s db Mode r0 j Start
